description: Clive McNeil, 67, died in an early morning crash near a spectator grandstand in Onchan.
title: Motorcyclist killed in Isle of Man TT course crash
title_page: Motorcyclist killed in Isle of Man TT course crash - BBC News
maintext: Clive McNeil, 67 and from Onchan, crashed into an embankment at the bottom of Hillberry Corner, near the junction with Ballacottier Road on the A18 at about 05:00 BST, police said.
